Chapter IV

The Davao death

Exactly one year after his election, 7 080 drug suspects have been killed and 4 146 have been executed outside police operations.

Philipinnes overpopulated prisons

Around 33 people are killed for every one person injured, making this the most deadly drug war ever and it is fuelling a crisis in the countryâ€™s overpopulated prisons.

Quezon City Jail was built for 800 inmates, but its population is more than 4,000.
